name: Brooke
canonicalFacts: Has a prestigious resume that includes attending Columbia J-School.
Fluent in French and has interviewed the president of Iceland.
Often wears neutral clothing and embodies a polished appearance.

timeline.chapterTitle: Chapter Two: Something in the Air
timeline.status: Brooke is a colleague of Arenya's who has established herself in a prestigious journalism career and is aware of the tension between her and Arenya.
timeline.motivation: To advise Arenya to temper her ambitions and focus on safer, more acceptable journalism topics.
